name: Parking Slide
description:
Parking Slide is a puzzle game where the player must remove all the cars from the parking lot without colliding. For this, you can click on the car and drag horizontally or vertically.
While listening to a beautiful and calm soundtrack, try to solve all the challenges.



Features:
  • 40 levels
  • calm soundtrack
  • Relaxing puzzles and great to pass the time.
  • Challenges with moderate difficulty
